name: Elemental Showdown (IshanDutta)
description:
Elemental Showdown is a 2 player local co-op game where you must defeat your opponent by using your magical staff. Find 3 shards of a staff to create one ultimate staff, and fire projectiles at your enemy to defeat them. Collect 3 of the same type to shoot projectiles faster.

Credits:
Ishan Dutta - Game Designer

Jethro Schoppenhorst - Programmer

Sam Hirsch  - Artist

Valhalla Villarreal - Artist

Caleb Cuzner - Music & Sound Designer
